# Mistsight (Spell)
## Overview
[[Divination Spells|Divination]]

**Level: [[1st Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 1]]**, [[1st Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 1]], [[1st Level Druid Spells|Druid 1]], [[1st Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 1]], [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 1]], [[BoXM 1st-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 1]], [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** 1001 Spells (Rite Publishing), pg. 163

You can see through mist, fog, heavy rain, and other water-based forms of concealment as if they werenâ€™t there. For example, a *[[Fog Cloud (Spell)|fog cloud]]* spell does not provide any concealment miss chance against your attacks. All non-visual effects of the spell work normally (for example, a *[[Stinking Cloud (Spell)|stinking cloud]]* nauseates you if you enter it, a *[[Solid Fog (Spell)|solid fog]]* slows you, and so on).

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Assassin 1, Sorcerer 1, Wizard 1 to Level.

*House Rule: Mistsight* can be made permanent using a *[[Permanency (Spell)|permanency]]* spell.
